attributes.action: Stand up for the People's Post - act now to protect daily deliveries‎ and jobs
attributes.additional_details:
Once you have signed this petition we ask that you share it via social media, email and text.

When sharing on social media please use the hashtag #PeoplesPost

If you are backing the campaign on twitter please tag @DaveWardGS and @CWUNews into your tweets.

More information on The People'sPost campaign can be found at this link http://www.cwu.org/peoplespost.html

Thank you for supporting our campaign and your local postal worker.
attributes.background: No-one ever explained why the public lost their voice in Royal Mail. Now it is privatised, there is a threat employment standards, the company’s ability to modernise & grow and the daily delivery as Ofcom promotes a race to the bottom. We expect the government to act to defend the Postal Industry.

rejection.details: Petitions need to make a clear request for a specific action from the UK Government or Parliament.
